item.title: House Republicans are pushing Trump’s big bill to the brink of passage
item.description: House Republicans are ready to vote on President Donald Trump’s $4.5 trillion tax breaks and spending cuts bill early Thursday.

item.title: Drive-by shooting in Chicago leaves 4 dead and 14 others wounded, police say
Supreme Court will take up a new case about which school sports teams transgender students can join
